name: Why Not Summon a Human?
description:
A group of party daemons do a summoning dance in search of wisdom.

Controls:

  • Space - Consult Summoning Tome
  • z, x, c, v - Activate Rune
  • left, right - Pass Daemon Ale (Control Other Daemon)

A game by Shane Spoor & Daniel Russell


Thanks to the following Freesound users for their audio:

  • gentle sea by Northern_Monkey
  • campfire.wav by Spandau
  • GONG1.aif by loofa
  • BASS 0207.wav by zgump
